examples.description: Given the current date is 2020-02-01 -> And a Universal Company which was started on 2015-01-01 -> And it has a contact in United States named Uncle Sam set to always charge VAT -> Given a sent USD invoice to Uncle Sam dated on 2020-01-01 -> And it has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ $1000.00 -> Given a sent USD credit note to Uncle Sam dated on 2020-02-01 -> And the credit note has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ $1000.00 -> And a credit note reconciliation is created for $1000.00 -> Then the credit note reconciliation should have ledger entries -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the invoice will be -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the credit note will be
examples.full_description: Credit note reconciliation Business is a Universal company that has no sales tax rates Given the current date is 2020-02-01 -> And a Universal Company which was started on 2015-01-01 -> And it has a contact in United States named Uncle Sam set to always charge VAT -> Given a sent USD invoice to Uncle Sam dated on 2020-01-01 -> And it has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ $1000.00 -> Given a sent USD credit note to Uncle Sam dated on 2020-02-01 -> And the credit note has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ $1000.00 -> And a credit note reconciliation is created for $1000.00 -> Then the credit note reconciliation should have ledger entries -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the invoice will be -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the credit note will be

examples.description: Given the current date is 2020-02-01 -> And a Universal Company which was started on 2015-01-01 -> And it has a contact in United States named Uncle Sam set to always charge VAT -> Given the company is registered for PST sales tax at 3%, 6%, 19% from 2019-09-01 -> Given a sent USD invoice to Uncle Sam dated on 2020-01-01 -> And it has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ $1000.00 + 19% PST -> Given a sent USD credit note to Uncle Sam dated on 2020-02-01 -> And the credit note has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ $1000.00 + 19% PST -> And a credit note reconciliation is created for $1190.00 -> Then the credit note reconciliation should have ledger entries -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the invoice will be -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the credit note will be
examples.full_description: Credit note reconciliation Business is a Universal company that has one sales tax rate Given the current date is 2020-02-01 -> And a Universal Company which was started on 2015-01-01 -> And it has a contact in United States named Uncle Sam set to always charge VAT -> Given the company is registered for PST sales tax at 3%, 6%, 19% from 2019-09-01 -> Given a sent USD invoice to Uncle Sam dated on 2020-01-01 -> And it has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ $1000.00 + 19% PST -> Given a sent USD credit note to Uncle Sam dated on 2020-02-01 -> And the credit note has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ $1000.00 + 19% PST -> And a credit note reconciliation is created for $1190.00 -> Then the credit note reconciliation should have ledger entries -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the invoice will be -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the credit note will be

examples.description: Given the current date is 2020-02-01 -> And a Universal Company which was started on 2015-01-01 -> And it has a contact in United States named Uncle Sam set to always charge VAT -> Given the company is registered for PST sales tax at 3%, 6%, 19% from 2019-09-01 -> And the company is registered for SST second sales tax at 1%, 2%, 4% from 2019-09-01 -> Given a sent USD invoice to Uncle Sam dated on 2020-01-01 -> And it has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ $1000.00 + 19% PST + 4% SST -> Given a sent USD credit note to Uncle Sam dated on 2020-02-01 -> And the credit note has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ $1000.00 + 19% PST + 4% SST -> And a credit note reconciliation is created for $1230.00 -> Then the credit note reconciliation should have ledger entries -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the invoice will be -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the credit note will be
examples.full_description: Credit note reconciliation Business is a Universal company that has two sales tax rates Given the current date is 2020-02-01 -> And a Universal Company which was started on 2015-01-01 -> And it has a contact in United States named Uncle Sam set to always charge VAT -> Given the company is registered for PST sales tax at 3%, 6%, 19% from 2019-09-01 -> And the company is registered for SST second sales tax at 1%, 2%, 4% from 2019-09-01 -> Given a sent USD invoice to Uncle Sam dated on 2020-01-01 -> And it has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ $1000.00 + 19% PST + 4% SST -> Given a sent USD credit note to Uncle Sam dated on 2020-02-01 -> And the credit note has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ $1000.00 + 19% PST + 4% SST -> And a credit note reconciliation is created for $1230.00 -> Then the credit note reconciliation should have ledger entries -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the invoice will be -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the credit note will be
